title: Coconut fish curry
description: A creamy fish curry with just enough spice, power it up with sweet potato and spinach to get you on your way to five a day.
ingredients: handful fresh coriander, plus extra for garnish
1 large sweet potato, peeled and chopped
150/5oz cod or pollack fillet, skinned and chopped (frozen is fine)
1 handful spinach leaves, or 2 blocks frozen spinach, defrosted and liquid squeezed out
